title: roit your leavebuster bugged on my account

embed.description: Provides free image upload and hosting integration for forums. Free picture hosting and photo sharing for websites and blogs.

body:
last games i had leavebuster i give you a photo. https://postimg.org/image/ofr1xu2q3/
but now when i played 5 games in a row my leavebuster isn't gone.
pleas help me.

replies.body:
If you had disconnected or gone AFK in any of those matches, they could have extended your LPQ penalty. At the end of a match, you should see a message regarding how many games you have left in your LPQ, so I'd check that to ensure you're up to date with how many you have left.

If you're experiencing a technical issue that is causing you to disconnect from matches, please let me know so we can work towards resolving it together.

i didnt go afk but one time i had attempting to reconnect for 2 minutes. but i wasnt afk so maybe thats why  but cnt you some how remove it. and i didnt get any message what said you left the game you will be placed in a lower queue.

"Attempting to reconnect" means you're not currently connected.  Not being connected for 2 minutes correctly flags you as afk.  You're not in the game with your team.  If you have internet problems, that sucks, but it also sucks for your teammates.

i always check my internet before playing and it was great i had 12 ping. but when i disconnect i still had internet i think my pc just couldnt connect to the server for some reason. still ty for your reply and everythink is ok now. i played one more game and now its gone

I understand that you're not in an LPQ anymore, but I wanted to mention that the symptoms you brought up are common to *Packet Loss* or *High packet buffering*, so as a preventative step, I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the common solutions for this.

If you have any other questions or concerns, please let me know.
mhh strange i played a 6 one and now i dont have leave stil ty guys
